*Infectra nods and follows the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one =
is not to be trusted? *Infectra says to the Radicons*
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, July=
 04, 2000 5:36 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Sinesis and Sinister both k=
ept poking each other, but saying nothing when the other looked. They both =
grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other, but they put the sw=
ords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

  Plintissa and Dracona decided to=
 follow Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Once there, they entered the=
 base.

  "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plin=
tissa asked. Dracona started to look around in logical places a lunatic mig=
ht hide.

  Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drinking tea =
and they left again.

  "Who shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

  "W=
homever wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on until they see =
the Alliance base.

  "This one looks good, lets go and ask them if they ha=
ve any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the base.
=

  "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join your fine team, we have been=
 looking for a faction to join, and it appears that it is you who will obvi=
ously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, what fo we have to do=
 to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, no killing a bot th=
ings or anything.)

  Gangon had a nightmare, He was again tied to the magi=
cal chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, a=
nd then Dracona. They all pulled of their masks and were 2 headed, one head=
 Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in p=
ain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he couldn't move. He considered th=
at thing about getting a replacement body, how it would be a good idea just=
 in case he had to get out of this dump, which was probable if he wanted to=
 kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to come back.

  The Rad=
icons looked at Infectra.

  "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we have=
 set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how=
 you would make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They walk=
ed inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

  Artist wa=
lked around the war room in circles, not quite knowing where he was going.
=
